channel.title: How sad
channel.description:
Vpsland closed my TCP and UDP Ports. They will not re-open them for security reasons.
gf 100% uptime 1.5k votes
well my server never had any players it's ok.
/end of rage/depressed post

item.title: How sad
item.dc:creator: @diggy diggy
item.description:
@diggy wrote:

Was not, thanks for the info I’ll do that now since the server is hosting off my computer while I’m searching for a new vps.

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: How sad
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

You can still get a new VPS and host using the same IP (as long as it was no-ip or example.yourdomain.com which redirects to your server’s IP and can be changed). Eventually (due to a rounding glitch) your uptime will go back to 100%.

Read full topic
